meta.title: x402 Hackathon - Build Internet-Native Payments
meta.description: An open sprint for builders shipping agents, protocols, and products on the x402 standard.

hero.title: x402 Hackathon
hero.tagline: Build the next era of agents and internet-native payments.
hero.description: You do not need to apply to participate, just submit your project by January 5th, 2026. Code submitted must be written during this time period.

mentors.label: Mentor bench
mentors.heading: Experts who ship with you
mentors.description: A tight roster of hands-on mentors sharing expertise across product, AI, infrastructure, and GTM.

formatSection.heading: Format
formatSection.description:
A 4 week virtual event focused on shipping real products, apps, and impactful open source. Participants will receive mentorship from industry experts.

Please note that there are no financial prizes for this hackathon. Winners will receive marketing and distribution support from contributors such as social posts and live streams. They will also have access to mentorship, invitations to major events and hacker houses, and potential grant opportunities.

footer.learnMore: To learn more about x402, visit

terms.metaDescription: Terms and Conditions for the x402 Hackathon
terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.legalNotice: These Terms and Conditions are only available in English.
